text: I'm in the pre-order line for the 15" (but not because I want more linkedin connections)
I kind of want one
The touchbar seems cool. I'm mostly disappointed about ram / hdd specs and magsafe
yeah was expecting the magsafe at least
remember to factor in the cost of a decent accidental damage insurance policy, guaranteed you will pull it off the desk
what is wrong with HDD specs?
I mean, I know you can pay to upgrade but I was hoping for an upgrade accross the line
i.e. min spec 512GB
right I went to 1GB; 2GB way too pricey
TB?
yeah sorry, reflex
heh
That's kind of OK, I don't mind throwing money at my sole professional tool. The ram is massively disappointing, nothing to be done there for any price
yeah 32gb seems like a no-brainer
money left on the table
wonder why they didn't offer that option
Before the keynote I was preparing to walk in to an apple store today and hand over cash. Now I'm wondering if I can make do with my current machine for 6-12 months waiting for a mid-cycle refresh
yeah i couldn't wait because of various factors but Kaby Lake will mean the mid-cycle will not be neglible
and while 10 hours battery life is good; i was secretly hoping for more but that'll come with Kaby Lake I suppose
what processors does the new laptops have
